subject: The Skinny: Tuesday, April 24, 2007
body:

Karl Rove Under The Microscope 
The Los Angeles Times reports a 
      little-known federal investigative unit is set to launch a probe of the 
      activities of one of the best-known members of the Bush administration: 
      political strategist Karl Rove. 
Joel Roberts has the highlights of the day's headlines.  More...

Joel Robertstheskinny@cbs.com
